master.yaml:
proxy:
  landing-page: /
  heartbeat-rate: 600000
  heartbeat-timeout: 120000
  container-wait-time: 12000
  port: 8080
  authentication: simple
  admin-groups: admin
  users:
  - name: user
    password: pass
  # Docker configuration
  docker:
    url: http://localhost:2375
    port-range-start: 20000
    port-range-max: 20100
  specs:
  - id: myapp
    container-cmd: ['R', '-e shiny::runApp(",/data/myapp/inst/shiny")']
    container-image: myapp
    access-groups: [admin, anx]

logging:
  file:
    shinyproxy.log

user@somemail.com.yaml:
proxy:
  landing-page: /
  heartbeat-rate: 600000
  heartbeat-timeout: 120000
  container-wait-time: 12000
  port: 8080
  authentication: simple
  admin-groups: admin
  users:
  - name: user
    password: pass
  # Docker configuration
  docker:
    url: http://localhost:2375
    port-range-start: 20101
    port-range-max: 20200
  specs:
  - id: myapp
    container-cmd: ['R', '-e shiny::runApp("/data/myapp/inst/shiny")']
    container-image: myapp
    access-groups: [admin, anx]

logging:
  file:
    shinyproxy.log
